mapper.select: select certificate_id, employee_id, certificate_code, certificate_name, certificate_start_time, certificate_end_time, certificate_agent from CertificateInfo where certificate_id = #{certificateId}
select certificate_id, employee_id, certificate_code, certificate_name, certificate_start_time, certificate_end_time, certificate_agent from pls.CertificateInfo
mapper.insert: insert into CertificateInfo(employee_id, certificate_code, certificate_name, certificate_start_time, certificate_end_time, certificate_agent) values (#{employeeId}, #{certificateCode}, #{certificateName}, #{certificateStartTime}, #{certificateEndTime}, #{certificateAgent})

insert into CertificateInfo(employee_id, certificate_code, certificate_name, certificate_start_time, certificate_end_time, certificate_agent) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.certificateCode}, #{entity.certificateName}, #{entity.certificateStartTime}, #{entity.certificateEndTime}, #{entity.certificateAgent})

insert into CertificateInfo(employee_id, certificate_code, certificate_name, certificate_start_time, certificate_end_time, certificate_agent) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.certificateCode}, #{entity.certificateName}, #{entity.certificateStartTime}, #{entity.certificateEndTime}, #{entity.certificateAgent})
on duplicate key update employee_id = values(employee_id), certificate_code = values(certificate_code), certificate_name = values(certificate_name), certificate_start_time = values(certificate_start_time), certificate_end_time = values(certificate_end_time), certificate_agent = values(certificate_agent)
mapper.update:
update CertificateInfo
employee_id = #{employeeId},
certificate_code = #{certificateCode},
certificate_name = #{certificateName},
certificate_start_time = #{certificateStartTime},
certificate_end_time = #{certificateEndTime},
certificate_agent = #{certificateAgent},
where certificate_id = #{certificateId}
mapper.select: select * from CertificateInfo where cast(certificate_code as char) like concat('${certificateId}','%')
